Name: Margherita Pizza
Description: Classic Margherita pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

Name: Pepperoni Pizza
Description: Pepperoni pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and spicy pepperoni slices.

Name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Description: Spaghetti pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, egg, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

Name: Caesar Salad
Description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and grilled chicken.

Name: Beef Burger
Description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and special sauce, served in a toasted bun.

Name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Description: Assorted seasonal vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.

Name: Grilled Salmon
Description: Grilled salmon fillet with lemon butter sauce, served with steamed vegetables.

Name: French Fries
Description: Golden and crispy French fries with a sprinkle of salt.

Name: Chocolate Cake
Description: Rich chocolate cake with layers of chocolate ganache and a hint of espresso.

Name: Cheesecake
Description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and fresh berry topping.

Name: Apple Pie
Description: Classic apple pie with a flaky crust, served with vanilla ice cream.

Name: Espresso
Description: Strong and rich espresso shot made with freshly ground coffee beans.

Name: Cappuccino
Description: Espresso coffee topped with steamed milk and a frothy milk foam.

Name: Iced Coffee
Description: Chilled coffee served over ice, perfect for a hot day.

Name: Orange Juice
Description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, rich in Vitamin C.

Name: Mojito
Description: Refreshing mojito cocktail with mint, lime, sugar, and soda.

Name: Chicken Wings
Description: Crispy fried chicken wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce.

Name: Bruschetta
Description: Toasted baguette slices topped with tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.

Name: Nachos
Description: Corn tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, salsa, and sour cream.

Name: Garlic Bread
Description: Toasted bread slices with garlic butter and a sprinkle of parsley.
